#summary A list of zTags

This is a list of all zTags avaliable at this time and it's plugin file.

|| *zTag* || *Plugin File* || *Description* ||
||zCode||zcode.inc.php||Help to present any code formated and lined||
||zCookie||zcookie.inc.php||Manage all Cookies||
||zDB||zdb.inc.php||Manage the connection with all databases||
||zEnv||zenv.inc.php||Work with server environment variables||
||zFile||zfile.inc.php||Manage files||
||zForm||zForm.inc.php||Help to manage forms||
||zGet||zget.inc.php||Manage GET information from browser||
||zHeader||zheader.inc.php||Change all HTTP headers||
||zHTML||zhtml.inc.php||Help to use all HTML tags with zTags||
||zLayout||zlayout.inc.php||Help to manage layouts (still in development)||
||zOM||zom.inc.php||zTags special for Onyx Manager 4.0||
||zPost||zpost.inc.php||Manage POST information from browser||
||zRequest||zrequest.inc.php||Manage all request event from browser||
||zServer||zserver.inc.php||Manage server variables||
||zSession||zsession.inc.php||Manage session variables||
||zTag||ztag.inc.php||All zTag legacy from Onyx Manager 3||
||zTemplate||ztemplate.inc.php||Help to manage templates (still in development)||
||zVar||zvar.inc.php||Manage all zTag variables||
